titles.title: Providing for consideration of a concurrent resolution providing for adjournment of the House and Senate for the Independence Day district work period.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 106-708, by Mr. Reynolds.
House Resolutions 469 and 482 are laid upon the table.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 250.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 541.
The previous question was ordered without objection.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 6/28/2000--Introduced. Makes it in order to consider a concurrent resolution providing for an adjournment of the House of Representatives and the Senate for the Independence Day district work period.
